Package au.csiro.pathling.security.ga4gh

package au.csiro.pathling.security.ga4gh
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    au.csiro.pathling.security
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    JwtAnyIssuerValidator
    A JWT validator that can validate the issuer claim against a set of allowed issuers.
    ManifestConverter
    A component that knows how to take a visa manifest and build up a set of corresponding query scopes.
    PassportAuthenticationConverter
    Examines a JWT, works out the passport filters and adds the appropriate Pathling authorities to the security context.
    PassportDecoderBuilder
     
    PassportDecoderFactory
    A JWT decoder for use with GA4GH passports.
    PassportScope
    Stores a set of FHIRPath filter expressions that define a permitted scope for the current client, based upon the GA4GH passport they presented.
    PassportScopeEnforcer
    A component that can filter a dataset of resources based on the passport scope of the current request.
    ScopeAwareDatabase
    A special type of Database that is capable of limiting the scope of resources based upon the passport scopes that have been applied to this request.
    VisaDecoderBuilder
     
    VisaDecoderFactory
    A JWT decoder specifically for visa tokens within GA4GH passports.
    VisaManifest
    Represents the JSON manifest that describes a GA4GH visa.
